content: --पतिः {1} the god presiding over creation; <ls>Ms. 12. 121.</ls> {2} an epithet of Brahmā; अस्याः सर्गविधौ प्रजपतिरभूच्चंद्रो नु कांतिप्रदः <ls>V. 1. 9.</ls> {3} an epithet of the ten lords of created beings first created by Brahmā; (see <ls>Ms. 1. 34</ls>). {4} an epithet of Viśvakarman, the architect of gods. {5} the sun. {6} a king {7} a son-in-law {8} an epithet of Viṣṇu. {9} a father, progenitor. {10} the penis. {11} a sacrifice.
